steps.name: Creating Inwarranty Job with create Job API
Setting up the BaseURI , Content Type as Application/JSON and attaching the SensitiveDataFilter with payload for the role
Getting the Property value from the config file
Getting the Auth Token for the role

parameters.name: payload
parameters.value: CreateJobPayload[mst_service_location_id=1, mst_platform_id=2, mst_warrenty_status_id=1, mst_oem_id=1, customer=Customer[first_name=Sailesh, last_name=Kumar, mobile_number=7823967575, mobile_number_alt=, email_id=saileshkumar1793@gmail.com, email_id_alt=], customer_address=CustomerAddress[flat_number=D 404, apartment_name=Rajiv Nagar, street_name=Vignesh Salai, landmark=Velachery, area=Chennai, pincode=600042, country=India, state=Tamil Nadu], customer_product=CustomerProduct[dop=2026-01-15T18:52:24.184429647Z, serial_number=81256049233069, imei1=81256049233069, imei2=81256049233069, popurl=2026-01-15T18:52:24.184462338Z, product_id=1, mst_model_id=1], problems=[Problems[id=1, remark=battery Issue]]]
